analysis.description:

ICO.transferTokens (/unique_chucks/4/0x49edf201c1e139282643d5e7c6fb0c7219ad1db7.sol#610-620) does not use the value returned by external calls:

SafeMath.assert (function @ /unique_chucks/4/0x49edf201c1e139282643d5e7c6fb0c7219ad1db7.sol#113-117) shadows built-in symbol "assert"

ICO.claimable has external calls inside a loop:
	- nc < sales.length && sales[nc].isComplete(currTime()) && (_includeRecent || sales[nc].stopTime() + 220752000 < currTime()) (/unique_chucks/4/0x49edf201c1e139282643d5e7c6fb0c7219ad1db7.sol#549-562)
